original_text: One basket had very good figs, even like the figs that are first ripe: and the other basket had very naughty figs, which could not be eaten, they were so bad.
korean_text: 한 광주리에는 처음 익은 듯한 극히 좋은 무화과가 있고 한 광주리에는 나빠서 먹을 수 없는 극히 나쁜 무화과가 있더라

sentences.original_text: One basket had very good figs
sentences.korean_translation: 한 바구니에는 아주 좋은 무화과가 있었고

sentences.original_text: even like the figs that are first ripe
and the other basket had very naughty figs
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 바구니에는 아주 나쁜 무화과가 있었으니
